summary: T-Mobile/MetroPCS responds to a legal demand regarding a target telephone number, stating they are unable to provide information because the number was not associated with a subscriber during the specified date range. The document is a tracking response from the carrier's law enforcement relations team.

events.title: T-Mobile/MetroPCS Legal Demand Response
events.description: T-Mobile/MetroPCS responds to a legal demand regarding a target telephone number, indicating they are unable to provide subscriber information because the number was not associated with their service during the requested date range.

keyFacts: T-Mobile/MetroPCS received a legal demand for information about a target telephone number.
The carrier was unable to respond because the target number was not associated with a T-Mobile or MetroPCS subscriber during the specified date range.
The response was issued on June 1, 2019, with tracking ID 2321537.
The document indicates an investigation involving telephone records was underway at that time.
